Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's an excellent investment for you. We're offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This exclusive offer is designed to help you maximize your return on investment while enjoying the top-tier features of our product. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to reach out. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
